docblock.long-description: Default is 10. But may be there are other plugins active and you run into trouble. So you can decide a higher (from 1) or a lower (to 100) priority for the output

docblock.long-description:
$obj = new MslsGetSet;
$obj->tmp = 'test';
$val = $obj->get_arr();          // array( 'tmp' => 'test' ) == $val
$val = $obj->has_value( 'tmp' ); // true == $val
$val = $obj->is_empty();         // false == $val
echo $obj->tmp;                  // prints 'test'
$obj->reset();
$val = $obj->get_arr();          // array() == $val
$val = $obj->has_value( 'tmp' ); // false == $val
$val = $obj->is_empty();         // true == $val
echo $obj->tmp;                  // prints null

docblock.description: A generic container for all properties of an instance

Check if the array has an non empty item with the specified key
docblock.long-description: This is method is similar to the overloaded __isset-method since __set cleans empty properties but I use for example $obj->has_value( $temp ) and not isset( $obj->$temp ) which is the same but a little bit ugly.
